UPDATE cb_instance
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
client_id = #{clientId},
instance_id = #{instanceId},
process_id = #{processId},
creator = #{creator},
expire_time = #{expireTime},
last_updator = #{lastUpdator},
order_value = #{orderValue},
version = #{version},
WHERE id = #{id}

create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
client_id = #{clientId},
process_id = #{processId},
creator = #{creator},
expire_time = #{expireTime},

order_value = #{orderValue},
version = #{version},
WHERE instance_id = #{instanceId}
